What's new

It's now Simple, Transparent and Honest. One tariff, any amount with no expiry

Voice

One Voice Tariff

Choose how much you spend

Our new voice tariff was made with you in mind. Talk and talk some more with a voice plan that does not expire. You also have the freedom to choose how much you would llike to spend on talk time.Simple dial *544# and select 'One voice tariff' on the menu.

Read More

VoLTE

Enjoy ultra HD voice and video calls

Enjoy Ultra HD Quality Voice Calls and Videos with sound so clear, it'll feel like you're right next to your friends

Data

One Data Tariff

Choose how much you spend

Our new data tariff now offers you a data plan with NO EXPIRY DATE. Enjoy the flexibility of purchasing data for any amount of airtime you choose. Simple dial *544#, select 1 on the menu, make your purchase and savor your new data plan.

Read More What happens to my current plan?

Dial *100# to view your usage

Dial *544# to activate your voice or data
